title: Two Canadians shot dead at upscale Mexican resort
content:
1. Two Canadians shot dead at upscale Mexican resort  BBC News

  4. Shooting at Ritzy Xcaret Hotel in Playa Del Carmen Leaves Two Canadians Dead  The Daily Beast
  5. Two Canadians killed after tourists shot at Mexican beach resort hotel  The Guardian
